title: CertainlyT loves to put infinite stacking on his champions
body:
{{champion:122}} had infinite ults
{{champion:429}} Infinite dashes and E stacks
{{champion:412}} Infinite Armor/AP scaling
{{champion:157}} Infinite dashes

{{champion:238}} and {{champion:143}} might be his only champions who don't have any broken infinite mechanic.

Another note, all of these have random passives attached to one of their spells.
